===Adverb===
{{zh-verb}}

# {{lb|zh|slang}} used after a verb when asking someone to repeat information
#: {{zh-x|你 住 在 哪兒{r} 來著[着]{zhe}？|Where do you live '''again'''?}}
# {{lb|zh|slang}} used after a verb to indicate a past action or state
#: {{zh-x|她 上 個 星期 還 搬家 來著[着]{zhe}，怎麼 會 在 旅遊 呢？|She moved house '''only''' last week, how can she be travelling now?}}
#: {{zh-x|我 忘記 怎麼 拼寫 你 的 名字 來著[着]{zhe}。|I've forgotten how to spell your name.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 說 什麼 來著[着]{zhe}？|What did I tell you? (i.e. I told you so!)}}
